dict.string: Smart File Organizer needs access to Apple Events to interact with the file system and organize your files efficiently.
Smart File Organizer needs access to your Desktop folder to organize files according to your rules.
Smart File Organizer needs access to your Documents folder to organize files according to your rules.
Smart File Organizer needs access to your Downloads folder to organize files according to your rules.
Smart File Organizer needs access to removable volumes to organize files on external drives.
Smart File Organizer needs access to network volumes to organize files on network drives.
Smart File Organizer needs access to cloud storage files to organize them according to your rules.
Smart File Organizer may need administrative access to organize files in system-protected directories.
